Subject: How much is too much?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=62491402
X-Yahoo-Profile: alternate_dph


How much cash would be too much to give players at the start of the game?

I want not to go overboard, but, at the same time, have lots of cash
so that even a large team (10-15 members) can be bought within the 1st
3 scenarios and the player would have enough money to start working on
improving those individual characters.
